message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the product for $9,500.  I believe it's a fair price considering its value.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7,500. It's a bit above my budget, but I'm willing to make a compromise.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $7,500 is too low, I'm willing to come down to $9,000. I'm confident you'll find this offer more reasonable.
I appreciate your willingness to come down on the price, but I'm still a bit hesitant. I'd be willing to meet you halfway at $8,250. That's my final offer.
